name: The Curse of the Narrator
description:
Dammit, Caroline!

RECOMMENDED TO BE PLAYED WITH HEADPHONES

The Witches of Klu Jam present:

Enjoy the frontiers of technology by joining this computer-voiced, pick-your-own-adventure-type narrative nightmare! Also, don't let the problematic content of this interactive artwork discourage you from breaking the shackles of #technicity.

Gameplay:

  • It's pretty straightforward.
  • Created for the 9th Klagenfurt Game Jam with the topic "Punishment"
  • Included diversifiers given in the Klu Jam (mostly implemented in ways that are rather meta):
    • Groundhog Day (the game loops around)
    • April Fool's (the game contains at least one wrong track/path/solution)
    • Blackout (it's not certain that players always see where they're going)

Development:

  • Ruxandra Diaconu (Ruxee) - Artist, Storywriting, Brainstorming in Crocs
  • Adriana Filippini (Adrippina) - Artist, UI Design, shockingly doesn't believe in zodiac signs (such a libra, right?!)
  • Marie Biedermann (vulvarine) - Music & Sound Engineering, Graphics, Motivational Guru
  • Kseniia Harshina (KseniaGa) - Game Design, Programming, Storywriting, Regular Sweetheart
  • Rachel Gorden (rachelgo) - Storywriting, Game Design, General Fun Management
(left to right) Adrianna, Marie, Rachel, Ruxi, Ksenia

Game Idea by Everyone

Source Code on GitHub:

Audio Sources:

  • Monks: “08112 monks warrior rip phrase.wav” by Robinhood 76. via Freesound.org. noncommercial 4.0.
  • CameraKlick: “camera_snap1.wav” by thecheeseman. via Freesound.org. 
  • ScaredBreathing: “Scared Breathing” by Aquillx. via Freesound.org. noncommercial 4.0.
  • HelpScream: “Female screaming for help” by AmeAngelofSin. via Freesound.org. 
  • GuitarMenuLoop: “Road to purple sky - Guitar Loop.wav” by Vangaar. via Freesound.org.

Narrator Voice generated using https://voicemaker.in/
